activities: Vistex, Inc. (Vistex) is a global leader in pricing, contract, incentive management and channel marketing solutions and services, providing go-to-market programs and enabling businesses with insightful information that drive revenue, control costs and increase margins.  Vistex also provides specialist rights and royalty management software for music, entertainment and brand licensing industries.  These software and services are deployed both on premise and in the cloud.
